description: This file sets up a basic WhatsApp API application with an AI agent powered by OpenAI's GPT-4 model. It defines an agent, configures the WhatsApp API, and starts the server.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific configurations.

classes.name: WhatsappAPI
classes.description: Handles WhatsApp API integration and server setup.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the FastAPI app instance for the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the WhatsApp API server with specified parameters.
